campaign.story:
Dearest Friends, 
I can’t believe I am writing this letter. It’s been a long time coming, and I am finally embarking on the journey of recording a full-length album! I have the songs, the stories, and the vision, and I’m more than ready to create a cohesive project that I hope you will love. 
All of my music projects so far have been self-funded (except for the single “Restore,” which was funded here on Kickstarter). I love songwriting so much, and have worked double-time to make it happen. In an ideal world, I would fund this record completely on my own as well, and would try to make the money back over time. Through my experiences over the past few years, I have learned that it is sometimes better to ask for help. A record label would usually give an artist a lot of funding to do a project like this. So, as a completely independent artist, I’m here to ask if you all will be my record label to help get this music into the studio and into your ears! While I will still be investing my own finances into this project, I am more excited about the prospect of having you alongside me. By asking those of you who will enjoy and listen to this music to consider backing this project up front, I am able to break through barriers to make this record the best it can be. Plus, I can only imagine how much fun it will be to write you more letters while this album is coming to life.  
These past five years have been full of inspiration, which ironically seems to happen during times that are both challenging and full of growth. The songs I have written tell stories about life, love, faith, breakups, loss, making commitments, growing up, marriage, the list goes on. I have a title and a full vision that has been in process for months (watch the video above to hear more)! 
The 10 new songs will be a combination of both the electropop and folk sides of my music, with some fresh inspiration too. Here is a quick snapshot of where the budget for this record will go: 
photo by Erin Tetterton, hair/make-up by Rachel Lane
Anything that we raise above the goal amount for this campaign will go directly to the making of this project!! (See below for info on the STRETCH GOAL!) 
This is an all or nothing campaign, which means that if we do not raise at least $15,000 by Sunday, March 24 then no funds will be raised, and I’ll have to cancel my studio time. If and when we do meet this goal, each backer will be charged only once for the amount that you pledge on the day that the campaign closes. My current goal is to finish recording the album this spring/summer and start releasing singles late summer 2019, with the full album releasing by the end of the year. There will be so many exciting steps in the process of creating this record, and I would love to be able to share this passion and dream of mine with you while it’s happening! 
I have compiled some exciting incentives which are listed on the side bar next to a $ pledge amount. These include (but are not limited to) VINYL records, a gorgeous hand-lettered lyric poster, your name being included in the album liner-notes, a digital book of original poetry, handwritten lyrics and special backstories about the songs and creation of the album, a Rorie tote bag, personal Skype-hang outs and songwriting sessions, House Concerts, and even the actual clock used in the music video for my song “Climate” (see photo): 
photo by Open Valve Studios
STRETCH GOAL: $20,000
While the minimum goal is $15,000, raising $20,000 would be HUGE in helping to push this album to be the best it can be. Here’s a quick snapshot of how the project will expand if we reach this Stretch Goal: 
-additional possibilities for Music Videos (I plan to film at least one, but this would help to solidify the budget for that video, as resources will be tight to make that happen)
-Publicity for an album can be very expensive, and with some extra funding I will be able to promote the album in ways that will reach more listeners, which goes a long way toward making a musician’s career more sustainable 
-opens up Touring possibilities once the record is released (!!!). I would absolutely love to get on the road and play these songs for you live!
--
So, now is the time where I take a deep breath and launch this campaign, inviting you in to make this album a reality. Thank you thank you thank you in advance, from the bottom of my heart. Let’s make a record together!!!!
With Love, 
P.S. – If you’ve never heard my music before, here are a few links to check out: 
Storyteller Music Video (and lots more!) on YouTube
Listen to the Dawn EP (and more) on Spotify, Apple Music, etc.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I am completely organized and ready to record and release this album. The main risk lies in the “all-or-nothing” nature of the Kickstarter platform. If we do not reach the $15,000 goal in 30 Days, then no one’s card will be charged, and no funds will be raised. 

This urgency, however, provides the opportunity for something exciting to happen. No amount is too small. $10 is essentially “pre-ordering” the album. Thank you in advance for your support!!! 

I will thoroughly update backers about the status of the project along the way, so you’ll know what to expect! Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions about this project, the funding, or your interest in becoming a backer. Thank you thank you!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Early Digital Download!
support.descp: Digital download and streaming access to the full album before anyone else! This is basically like pre-ordering the album, and I'll make sure you hear it early too!

support.title: Signed Hardcopy Album!
support.descp: Signed physical CD copy of the album mailed to your doorstep + digital download/streaming access to the full album before everyone else!

support.title: Poetry Book!
support.descp: A digital book of original poems (written/designed by Rorie) that will be released exclusively through this Kickstarter campaign + signed physical CD copy of the album mailed to your doorstep + digital download/streaming access to the full album before everyone else!

support.title: Backstory Booklet!
support.descp: A digital booklet with lyrics, stories behind the songs, photos, and other backer-exclusive handwritten notes and behind-the-scenes info about the making of this album! + digital book of original poetry + signed physical CD copy of the album mailed to your doorstep + digital download/streaming access to the full album before everyone else!

support.title: Fancy Handwritten Lyrics!
support.descp: Fancy handwritten lyrics to any Rorie song of your choice (on cardstock) + backstory booklet + digital book of original poetry + signed physical CD copy of the album mailed to your doorstep + digital download/streaming access to the full album before everyone else!

support.title: Postcard Set!
support.descp: A printed set of 4 lyric-themed postcards designed by Rorie and mailed to your doorstep + fancy handwritten lyrics + digital backstory booklet + digital poetry book + signed CD + early digital download!

support.title: Signed Vinyl!
support.descp: Signed Vinyl (!!) copy of the album + 4 printed lyric-themed postcards designed by Rorie + fancy handwritten lyrics + digital backstory booklet + digital poetry book + signed CD + early digital download!

support.title: "Orbit" Handlettering Poster!
support.descp: A beautiful, professionally designed (and professionally printed on high quality paper) calligraphy lyric poster with a favorite line from my previously released song “Orbit” that will look great in your house, your office, wherever + signed Vinyl + 4 printed lyric-themed postcards designed by Rorie + fancy handwritten lyrics + digital backstory booklet + digital poetry book + signed CD + early digital download!

support.title: Tote Bag!
support.descp: A tote-bag designed by Rorie that you can use to carry books, groceries, your gym shoes, etc. + printed “Orbit” hand-lettering poster + signed Vinyl + 4 printed lyric-themed postcards designed by Rorie + fancy handwritten lyrics + digital backstory booklet + digital poetry book + signed CD + early digital download!

support.title: Your Name in Album Credits!
support.descp: Your name printed in album credits! + Rorie tote bag + printed "Orbit" hand-lettering poster + signed Vinyl + 4 printed lyric-themed postcards + fancy handwritten lyrics + digital backstory booklet + digital poetry book + signed CD + early digital download!

support.title: The "Climate" Clock + Skype Session!
support.descp: You’ll get the actual clock used in the “Climate” music video, signed if you want (only one available!) + a 30 minute personal Skype session where we can talk about music and songwriting (I'll even play a song for you!) + all of the prizes listed above mailed to your doorstep!

support.title: Skype Session!
support.descp: We can Skype for 30 minutes about songwriting, music, etc. I’ll even play a song for you if you want (it will be a fun time!) + all of the prizes listed above mailed to your doorstep!

support.title: Personalized Song!
support.descp: I will write you a personalized song! Whether it's a lullaby for your precious newborn, a song to give your grandma for Christmas, a song for your wedding, a graduation or anniversary gift - get creative! - we can Skype for 30 minutes (or discuss via e-mail, your choice!) so that I can get an idea of your story and vision, and we will bring it to life! We can decide on the final version, and I will craft and self-produce a home recording for you. We can discuss a time frame that works well for you. If you are a singer and already have some lyrics and an idea, I can help you finish it! I will provide you with a lyric/chord chart and an accompaniment track so that you can sing your song at your next performance, or in the shower! + all of the prizes above mailed to your doorstep

support.title: House Show!
support.descp: Oh, am I excited about this! I will play an exclusive show for you + your family + your friends. All you have to do is provide the house, backyard, church, or community center. I'll bring snacks and other fun surprises and prizes for attendees. It will be a personalized time of music and storytelling. I'd love to get to know you and hear your story too! I owe you such a party for helping to make this record happen! Must be located within 100 miles of Washington DC, New York City or Columbus, Ohio or travel costs not included. Contact rorie@roriemusic.com with any questions about coordinating your event! + all of the prizes above mailed to your doorstep

updates.update_userinfo: "Train" heard in Movie Theaters around the USA!
updates.update_content:
Dear Kickstarter Backers, 
Big updates! The album is completely recorded, mostly mixed (just tying up a few lose ends), and will be mastered within the next few weeks. It has been hard for me to not update you every day (that would probably get annoying after a while...) to fully express the amount of times that I've thought of each of you individually within the past few months and felt this overflowing feeling of gratitude.

updates.update_userinfo: shipping calamities | a quick note
updates.update_content:
Dear Friends, 
It has been an incredible month. Thank you so much for being a part of this campaign and for making this album possible!!! 
I am heading into the studio next week and will be recording the album between April - June 2019. Expect a backer exclusive update coming your way early May. I'll take you behind-the-scenes and show you how the songs are coming to life. In the meantime, I'll be sure to update you more regularly via social media, @roriemusic. I will also be sending out backer "surveys" to get your mailing address, and to get details for personalized incentives (for example, which handwritten lyrics you would like, etc.), so be on the lookout!

updates.update_userinfo: Incentives Shipping | Album Release Month is Here!!!
updates.update_content:
Dear Friends, 
As you probably know, there are 5 days left in this campaign! We are officially on the final stretch now with still over $800 to raise. I will be doing everything I can to ensure that we reach the goal, however, if you have any other friends who might be interested in becoming a part of this project, then now is the time to share this with them and express the urgency of this impending deadline! haha! I am forever grateful and can't wait to celebrate with you all very soon!!!!!

So glad I found you and this campaign:) Already almost funded in just a few days!

campaign.story:
Hi, friends!!!! My name is Kitty. I'm 22 years old, I'm a singer/rapper/producer and I've always been really into doing things all by myself. 
I've accomplished a lot of crazy things this way, but this time I have a project so big that the time has come to ask for a little help getting started: my first full-length, self-released record- which will also be my first project to ever be released physically!!!
When my first music video "Okay Cupid" went ~viral~ in 2012, I was living in Daytona Beach, Florida selling little girls' accessories at the mall to put myself through college. Thanks to the unexpected success of a bunch of songs I recorded in my closet, I was able to move to New York City and continue to pursue a music career I'd always dreamed of but never in a million years thought I would achieve. Since then, I've self-released four solo EPs, a bunch of music videos, some mixtapes, and more singles than I can even recall. I've had the opportunity to tour and collaborate with artists I've looked up to for years- Danny Brown, Riff Raff, The Ready Set, Anamanaguchi, Sufjan Stevens, Ryan Hemsworth, LE1F and more. All of these things have been made possible without a label, most of them without an artist manager, and a lot of them without knowing what the hell I'm doing at all, but I feel like the luckiest girl in the world. 
I know how rare these opportunities are, and I want to use them to make the world a little more glittery.
However, there's always been that one little thing I haven't been able to do on my own, and it's the one thing I've truly been working for since the beginning; I want to finally create a REAL album. I want it to sound perfect. I want to record it in a studio. I want to listen to it on vinyl, and send CDs of it to my grandma to play in her zumba class. I want to be able to perfectly represent it artistically, with visuals that will bring to life the world I've imagined for all these years. I want to take it on tour and sing it for the world. I want to share it with everyone I possibly can, without a label or a company or a man at a desk telling me my ideas "don't fit" and giving me a sweetened-up lecture on why they can't take a chance on me unless I quit making the art I believe in and start being a little more "marketable". 
This record has been in the works for a couple years and it tells a story of growing up in a tropical tourist trap and wandering around the country. I've written everything myself, and I'm collaborating with some of my favorite artists to create sounds that set my stories in the fun, beautiful world I've dreamed up around it. This funding will provide professional studio time, mixing and mastering, and a budget for visuals. It will also go towards production and distribution of CDs and 12" vinyl records, and to finally support a member of Team Kitty who has worked tirelessly with me on every single project for absolutely no pay. I plan on releasing the record in January of 2016. 
New rewards and more info about the record will be added to this page over the course of the fundraiser- I can't wait to share my art & ideas with you!!!!!!!! ╰( ･ ᗜ ･ )╯
I f**kng love every single person who has supported me and my music up until this point, and I hope you all believe in this project as much as I do. Here's a photo of my dog, Little Puff, who has heard every song thousands of times and promises they're all really good. 
"It's a great record"
 Header photograph by Shelby Sells
GOAL 1: $25,000 - RECORD
(WHICH WE DID IN THE FIRST 30 Hrs!!!!)
GOAL 2: $50,000 - TOUR!!!!!
So if we reach this goal, I'll be able to pay for transportation, support, merch, stage setup, all that jazz- for my first REAL HEADLINING TOUR~
This has been another dream of mine since I started, but I didn't want to get ahead of myself with things. Now that I've seen what you guys can do and how much faith you have in me, I hope you're here for this!!!
also i'll be able to play a show in europe for the first time which is like....omfg afdls;kjas;dflkj
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Since I've done all this stuff before on a smaller, no-budget scale, I've pretty much faced every challenge there is when it comes to making and releasing a record. The only setbacks I can imagine are delays in production of the record (not likely- I run a pretty tight ship when it comes to scheduling) and delays in production of videos. The good news is, I already have a solid plan for all this stuff, and since I'm already working on everything, I expect smooth sailing once this Kickstarter is off the ground. Also, sorry for using two sailing metaphors in the same paragraph. I've been listening to ocean sounds in the background while typing this.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hey guys, Action Flick Chick Katrina Hill here (or @actionchick as some of you may know me). I review movies, with a major focus on action flicks, and do interviews and con coverage at www.actionflickchick.com
For the past several months I’ve been working on a webseries called Geeks and Gamers Anonymous, also known as GAGA. It’s a sitcom about a three girls joining a gaming addiction support group, and filming it has been an absolute blast.
The reason I’ve put this kickstarter together is to help GAGA get off the ground. Things like editing costs, equipment rental fees, and location rental have all punched a hole in the GAGA bankroll, so I need your help. With this kickstarter I hope to not only finish funding and putting together the first season, but use some of the funds to work on the second season and beyond. 
We've completed one episode, which you can find here:
GAGA: Dungeons and Dragons
I managed to get that episode edited together thanks to a lot of good will and help from my friends, so take a look at it, and if you like it, or like me, or like action movies in general, please toss a few gold coins our way. :)
Thanks, guys!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Exclusive Look at GAGA Episode 1!
updates.update_content:
You helped the Kickstarter get funded, now it's time to premiere Geeks and Gamers Anonymous! The first episode will air Wednesday, September 19 on the Action Flick Chick youtube channel. Subscribe now so you don't miss out on anything! Also, I've started sending the rewards out, so expect something awesome in your mailbox/e-mailbox shortly. For those of you who get a thank you on Action Chick's website, it can be found here!
Thanks again, everyone!

updates.update_userinfo: GAGA Premiere!
updates.update_content:
We made it to goal #2! THANK YOU! Each and every one of you are like the beautiful babies I've never had. Now the GAGA team can begin immediate work on our epic second season.
With goal #2 reached, we have a new mission: reach $7,000 so we have enough funds to finish Season 2 and include our Taken parody: Taken 3(DS).
In the episode, my 3DS gets kidnapped and I have to rescue it, Liam Neeson style, by making phone calls and kicking ass. However, in order to do this classic action flick justice we need a bit more scratch to cover things like a fight choreographer, a martial artist for me to brawl with, and a car chase.

updates.update_userinfo: Goal #2 reached! Now... GAGA gets Taken!
updates.update_content:
We did it! We've reached our goal for GAGA season 1! Thank you guys so, so much! But the kickstarter isn't over! If we reach $5000 we can begin immediate work on GAGA season 2! These new funds will help cover things like:
-additional editing costs and equipment rental
- adding incidental music

updates.update_userinfo: We made it! Season 2 around the corner?
updates.update_content: Two weeks to go and we've reached two-thousand, two-hundred and twenty-two dollars! We're well past the half-way point and things are looking great! Thanks for supporting indie webseries and geek girls! Keep spreading the word and we'll have more than enough funds to churn out plenty of GAGA goodness for some time to come.

comments.content: Yay. Looking forward to watching the season.
W00t! Proud to pledge and help promote over on GeekGirlCon!!

campaign.story:
After many recording projects, it's time for me to create a record that fulfills my dreams and gives what my supporters deserve. I would like to use kickstarter to fund the creation of my record and it's promotion.
My plan is to complete an album with world-renowned producer, J Chris Griffin. Chris has worked on records with some of today’s biggest artists, including: Madonna, Kanye West, John Legend, Missy Elliot, Janet Jackson, The Corrs, Mis-Teeq, JoJo, John McLaughlin and many more. Chris Griffin believes in my project so much that he is willing to meet me half way on the cost of the record if you guys can help me with the rest.
Together we can make this album!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: The single is out!:) Hope you got the pics/mp3, drawings this week!
updates.update_content:
Hey guys! :) 
How are you? Hope all is FAB! Things are great here! :) The single "Next Week Kind of Girl" from the album is out! YIPPPPPEEE! Each one of you who provided me with an email address received a free MP3 of the single. If you didn't get it for some reason because your email has changed (a few got bounced back) let me know your email and I'll get it right to you!:) By this point you should have also received the autographed glossy photos if you pledged in that category!:) The personal drawings are going out this week! I drew a lot of dinosaurs and snails! LOL Don't ask me why!!! hehehe I want to let you know that the official lyrics video is out on youtube ! Here's the link:

updates.update_userinfo: UPDATE! Things are moooooooving, y'all!
updates.update_content:
http://youtu.be/PLbEokcu2UU
Thank-you shout-out video to everyone who donated to my album through kickstarter!:) ♥ Said everyones name and watch out for little bubbles with secret shout-outs!!! I'm still editing the video so keep checking in!:) I LOVE YOU ALL SO MUCH!!! ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ Just click that link above and it will take you to the video!!! :) :) :)

updates.update_userinfo: THE YOUTUBE SHOUT OUT VIDEO TO YOU!!! :)
updates.update_content:
WAAAAAAH! I LOVE YOU!!! 
4 HOURS LEFT TO BE A PART OF THE ALBUM! This is a video to my backers and people who are thinking of backing me!:) Thanks SO SO SO SO MUCH! This is going to be such a *BLAST* !!! I can't wait to work with you!:) ♥ ♥ ♥ LOVE! Rachel http://youtu.be/-htcDS6x8Lg

updates.update_userinfo: Going so great thanks to you!!!
updates.update_content:
Dearest TEAM RACHIE ALBUM!
I am so happy I am basically hyperventilating! $5030 raised! This is so incredibly exciting! I am thrilled to have you on board for this project with me and floored by the kindness and generosity you have shown!:) You will be receiving inside information and secret emails and videos about the album, along with the super cool rewards with every pledge $5 and up!:) We are going to have a BLAST! WHOOOO! If you don't know about the project please visit:
GROUP HUG! AHHHH! I'm so excited! I just want to *SQUEEZE* you all!:) WE are going to have SO much fun! :)
LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE! Rachie Bachie Boo

updates.update_userinfo: Exciting news!
Backers! Thanks from the bottom of my heart.. some ideas and details
updates.update_content:
Day 3 and we already hit the $500 mark! Thank you so much to everyone who jumped on board so fast!!!! 
LOVE
  Rachel!

comments.content: Way to go Rachel!!! Can't wait to hear the album. You are such an inspiration going after your dream. Love it!!
we did it!
Congratulations, Rachel! Can't wait to hear the album! =)
I believe congratulations are in order...?!
hey everyone using my other card i went ahead and pledged 40... PLEASE help!

campaign.story:
As most of you know, I've been working hard at my music for a while now..but I still don't have a product. I think everyone will agree, without a product you can't really do much. SO! I am raising money to be able to record, mix, master, and promote my very first EP!! I am telling everyone I know to help out with this project. I'll be doing a ton of blog shows, live shows, youtube videos etc. I have the best fans and supporters I could ever ask for, and I know we can pull together and make this happen!
Here are a couple of my links to some of my older music.
http://www.youtube.com/NatalieAnn86
http://www.myspace.com/natalieannmusic

Risks and challenges

updates.update_userinfo: Hold You Down- new original!
updates.update_content:
Here is another new song that will be on my EP!
Guys, I am so excited about this EP, I can hardly stand it! I cannot thank everyone enough for donating and supporting my dream. It means the world to me. We are almost there!! YAY!!!
Thank yall so much for everything. I can't wait for you guys to hear my new music! I love yall!!
-Natalie Ann

updates.update_content:
Hey everyone! This is a new song which will be on my EP, so let's raise the money and get it out there!!
Love ya'll!!
-Nat

comments.content: Congrats, Natalie! You totally deserve this moment! I'm glad to be a part of it. ily! <3
YAAAAAAAAAAAAAY! You made it Nat! <3 I cannot WAIT to hear it.
$590 to go! C'mon ppl! Final stretch! Contribute whatever you can!
Woohoo! So close! Trust me Nat, we want this just as much as you do! We love you, and you deserve everything you dream.
Almost 3/4 of the way there! C'mon ppl! Let's do this! Bump up your pledges if you've pledged already! If you haven't yet, pledge now! What are you waiting for?! Thank you! Natalie appreciates it!
